module.name: Follow Me
module.changelog: *12.0.11* FREEPBX-8513 Connectedline wrong placement of ,i *12.0.10* Licensing updates *12.0.9* Add find me link back to extensions page *12.0.8* FREEPBX-8272 UCP Deletes Follow Me Entries *12.0.7* Follow Me auto hash on external number *12.0.6* FREEPBX-7894 Append pound symbol in UCP if needed *12.0.5* Cleanup for UCP *12.0.4* Missing functionality *12.0.3* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.2* Detect Change on change then blur for UCP *12.0.1* UCP Module Addition *2.11.0.6* Add license file *2.11.0.5* Allow connected line display of callee presence state *2.11.0.4* Help Text and supported tag *2.11.0.3* #6785 *2.11.0.2* misc *2.11.0.1* #6275 *2.11.0.0* version bump *2.10.0.8* #5832 *2.10.0.7* #5734 *2.10.0.6* syntax error in IF() dialplan function, other bug fix *2.10.0.5* #5603 *2.10.0.4* #5358, #5521, #5169 #5601 *2.10.0.3* #5358, #5521, #5169 *2.10.0.2* #5478 *2.10.0.1* call recording bug fixes *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.6* #5011 *2.9.0.5* #4977 *2.9.0.4* #4815 *2.9.0.3* #4799, #4801 *2.9.0.2* #4758 *2.9.0.1* #4651, #4701, #4655 *2.9.0.0* #4646
module.description: Much like a ring group, but works on individual extensions. When someone calls the extension, it can be setup to ring for a number of seconds before trying to ring other extensions and/or external numbers, or to ring all at once, or in other various 'hunt' configurations. Most commonly used to ring someone's cell phone if they don't answer their extension.
